uml4iot.GenericStateMachine.core

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • uml4iot.GenericStateMachine.core.State

  • public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a single state in a state machine and its operations

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      State()

      void addDeferredEvent(SMReception event)
      Add deferred events for this transition.
      void addTransition(Transition t)
      Use this method to add a transition to this state
      protected abstract void doActivity()
      This method is called after the entry state.
      protected abstract void entry()
      This method is called when the state machine is entering this state
      protected abstract void exit()
      This method is called when the state machine is exits this state

      Checks if a transition is triggered
      java.util.Collection<SMReception> getDeferredEvents()
      Return a list with all the deferred events for this state
      protected boolean hasCompletionTrans()
      This method check if there is a transition that is on completion, meaning that it does not need an event to trigger

      • State

        public State()

    • Method Detail

      • entry

        protected abstract void entry()
        This method is called when the state machine is entering this state

      • doActivity

        protected abstract void doActivity()
        This method is called after the entry state. Use this method to implement the main work of a state

      • exit

        protected abstract void exit()
        This method is called when the state machine is exits this state

      • addTransition

        public void addTransition(Transition t)
        Use this method to add a transition to this state
        Parameters:
        t - The transition to be added

      • hasCompletionTrans

        protected boolean hasCompletionTrans()
        This method check if there is a transition that is on completion, meaning that it does not need an event to trigger
        Returns:
        True if there is a completion transition, false if there is not

      • addDeferredEvent

        public void addDeferredEvent(SMReception event)
        Add deferred events for this transition. Deferred events are events that are ignored for this state but don't get discarded from the queue
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be added to the deferred event list

      • getDeferredEvents

        public java.util.Collection<SMReception> getDeferredEvents()
        Return a list with all the deferred events for this state
        Returns:
        A collection with events

      • getActiveTransition

        public Transition getActiveTransition(SMReception curEvent)
        Checks if a transition is triggered
        Parameters:
        curEvent - the event to check if triggers a transition
        Returns:
        A transition that is triggered by the curEvent, null if no transition is triggered
